description: This file defines a Java entity class 'Project' for use with JPA/Hibernate, representing a project with various attributes and lifecycle callbacks.

classes.name: Project
classes.description: JPA entity class mapping to 'projects' table, representing a project with fields for id, name, description, start/end dates, and audit timestamps.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Sets 'createdAt' and 'updatedAt' timestamps to current time upon persistence (entity creation).

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Updates 'updatedAt' timestamp to current time upon entity update.
